1.1.1.name: wordpress/ajax-comments-spy
1.1.1.description:
AJAX Comments Spy widget enables you to output comment updates to your users.

The plugin fetches the comments according to the settings in the administration panel.

You can specify whether you want to spy pages, posts or both. You can change the title of the widget, total amount of posts to output and update interval time. You can configure to output comments from password protect posts.
